hero.slogan:
Beyond the Hype
A True Community Force
hero.subtitle: Discover the power of a community-driven token on the Solana blockchain.

about.title: This is hallohats
about.text: We're not just another coin; we are a movement. Born on the high-speed, low-cost Solana blockchain, HOT is a tribute to the power of community and the universal language of humor. Our mission is to create a decentralized ecosystem where every member has a voice and a stake in our collective success. We're leveraging the power of memes not just for laughs, but to build a resilient and vibrant community poised for long-term growth.

features.title: Core Principles
features.feature1_text: hallohats is owned by its community. Key decisions and future developments are guided by community consensus.
features.feature2_text: hallohats was launched with transparency at its core. The majority of the supply is dedicated to the community.
features.feature3_text: Leveraging Solana's lightning-fast network for near-instant transactions and incredibly low fees.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.text: Our token distribution is designed for community trust and long-term growth.

roadmap.title: Our Strategic Roadmap
roadmap.phase1: Phase 1: Ignition & Foundation - Successful fair launch, initial community growth on X, and listing on major Solana DEXs.
roadmap.phase2: Phase 2: Expansion & Visibility - Aggressive influencer marketing campaigns, listings on CoinGecko and CoinMarketCap, and community contests.
roadmap.phase3: Phase 3: Utility & Ecosystem - Development of unique holder utilities, partnerships with other Solana projects, and securing listings on major CEXs.

footer.text: hallohats. For the community, by the community.
